file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 49-12-02-06 - APU ELASTOMERIC MOUNTS - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL APU ELASTOMERIC MOUNTS - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives procedures to do the inspection on the APU elastomeric mounts. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY APU ELASTOMERIC MOUNTS - INSPEC- ALL 49-12-02-200-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 49-12-02 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-12-02-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. APU ELASTOMERIC MOUNTS - INSPECTION A. General (1) The APU elastomeric mounts supports the APU, and eliminate the vibration to the aircraft fuselage. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 49-11-00-000-801-A/400 APU COWLING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 49-11-00-400-801-A/400 APU COWLING - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 313 APU Cowling D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the APU work area 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task APU work area I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open these circuit breakers and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tags to them: – APU CONTROL. – APU FUEL SOV. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 49-12-02 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Remove the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-11-00-000-801-A/400) to get access to the APU. J. General Visually Inspect APU Elastomeric Mounts (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Inspect the elastomers for attack by oil or other fluids as shown by a swollen or too soft elastomer. (2) Inspect each elastomeric mount for contamination. If applicable, clean with a dry, lint- free cloth. (3) Inspect the elastomers for loss of flexibility, which would cause loss of resilience. Replace all defective parts as required. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-11-00-400-801-A/400). (2) Remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tags and close these circuit breakers. – APU CONTROL. – APU FUEL SOV. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 49-12-02 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
